text: Drury Melone (1833-1903) was a California politician who served as the 11th California Secretary of State and a Presidential Elector. Melone was a stockholder of the Union Pacific Railroad and also owned and operated the St. George Hotel in Sacramento, California. == References == Category:1833 births Category:1903 deaths Category:California Republicans Category:Secretaries of State of California
title: Drury Melone
